00037 #if defined(AT91SAM7X256)
00038   typedef enum
00039   {
00041     POWER_ON_RESET   = 0x00,
00043     WDT_RESET        = 0x02,
00045     WARM_RESET       = 0x03,
00047     EXTERNAL_RESET   = 0x04,
00049     BROWN_OUT_RESET  = 0x05
00050   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00051 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1)
00052   typedef enum
00053   {
00055     NULL_PTR_DEREF_RESET = 0x0,
00057     POWER_ON_RESET       = 0x1,
00059     EXTERNAL_RESET       = 0x2,
00061     BROWN_OUT_RESET      = 0x4,
00063     WDT_RESET            = 0x8,
00065     JTAG_RESET           = 0x10,
00067     WARM_RESET           = 0x11
00068   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00069 #elif defined(ATXMEGA128A1) || defined(ATXMEGA256A3) || defined(ATXMEGA256D3)
00070   typedef enum
00071   {
00073     NULL_PTR_DEREF_RESET = 0x00,
00076     POWER_ON_RESET       = (1U << 0),
00079     EXTERNAL_RESET       = (1U << 1),
00081     BROWN_OUT_RESET      = (1U << 2),
00084     WATCHDOG_RESET       = (1U << 3),
00087     DEBUG_RESET          = (1U << 4),
00090     WARM_RESET           = (1U << 5)
00091   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00092 #elif defined(AT32UC3A0512)
00093   typedef enum
00094   {
00097     POWER_ON_RESET       = (1U << 0),
00100     BROWN_OUT_RESET      = (1U << 1),
00102     EXTERNAL_RESET       = (1U << 2),
00104     WDT_RESET            = (1U << 3),
00106     DEBUG_RESET          = (1U << 4),
00108     CPUERR_RESET         = (1U << 7),
00111     OCDRST_RESET         = (1U << 8),
00114     JTAGHARD_RESET       = (1U << 9),
00116     WARM_RESET           = (1U << 10),
00117   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00118 #elif defined(AT91SAM3S4C)
00119   typedef enum
00120   {
00123     GENERAL_RESET        = 0x00,
00126     BACKUP_RESET         = 0x01,
00128     WDT_RESET            = 0x02,
00130     WARM_RESET           = 0x03,
00132     EXTERNAL_RESET       = 0x04
